messages.subject: RE: Floor cleaning
messages.msgSnippet: ... It seems to change every time I have to refill, BUT, it mostly consists of vinegar, a few drops of shampoo(natural and a nice scent is preferred) MAYBE
messages.messageBody:
> What's your recipe?
>
> Cory


It seems to change every time I have to refill, BUT, it mostly consists
of vinegar, a few drops of shampoo(natural and a nice scent is
preferred) MAYBE some borax or baking soda and a few drops of whatever
essential oil I am into that day!

The one I have going now is SUPER Simple (I am about 38 week pregnant
and not feeling anything too much!!LOL) Vinegar and cinnamon leaf e.o.
Smells AWESOME (hubby thinks too strong) but for me its holiday-ish and
clean. No toxic garbage for my kids to pick up on their feet or in
something they drop and then put in their mouths.

Annette, Jason
& Our 3 Boujas
Nicolas, Joseph,
peanut due 1/12
